header_text: You are in the car with your mother-in-law and you put on the radio. As you discuss which station to listen to, you realize that you and your mother-in-law have musical tastes that are wildly clashing.

elements.Text: Does your mother-in-law think you know nothing about music?

elements.name: You are in the car with your mother-in-law and you put on the radio. As you discuss which station to listen to, you realize that you and your mother-in-law have musical tastes that are wildly clashing._Social Situations_comp_question
